document_data.name: Tharian
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharian''' was a collection of [[human]] dialects spoken in the region of the [[Thar]].{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}}
document_data.Speakers: Tharian was spoken by the inhabitants of the north and west [[Moonsea]], from [[Glister]] in the north to [[Hillsfar]] in the south, and from [[Snowmantle]] in the west to [[Sulasspryn]] in the east.
document_data.Dialects: The [[Zhentarim]] spoke their own dialect of Tharian, in addition to their own secret [[wikipedia:en:argot|argot]] known as '''Zhentarim Argot'''. The citizens of Glister and [[Phlan]] each spoke their own dialects, and the nearby cities of [[Melvaunt]] and [[Thentia]] shared a common Tharian dialect also. Likewise, [[Hulburg]] and Sulasspryn spoke a dialect known as East Tharian.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28-29}}
document_data.History:
Tharian derived from [[Auld Tharian]], one of the [[North Thorass languages]].

After the destruction of Sulasspryn in [[1307 DR]] and that of Hulburg by the [[Zhents]] in [[1347 DR]], the East Tharian dialect had nearly gone extinct.
